conversations.content: How many appointments do I have today?

<function_thought>
To determine the number of appointments for Emma Johnson today, I first need to retrieve the current date using the `get_current_day` function. After obtaining the date, I can use that information to call the `get_day_calendar_events` function, which will provide the appointments for today. 
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The current date has been retrieved as "2024-05-15". I will now use this date to get the appointments for today by calling the `get_day_calendar_events` function.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_day_calendar_events(day="2024-05-15")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
